character.statement: How do you survive in here?
Yeah! I need to get up to those shipping containers. but the zombies attack me every time I step out of the light.
Bleh! This coffee is too strong!
I've learned my lesson, from now on, I'm just locking the door and staying put.
I thought the end of the world would come when the machines became self-aware. But zombies? Didn't see that coming.
Canned food, bottled water, and the companionship of a shadow puppet I call 'Hombre Umbra.'
I'll be honest: I'd do just about anything for a fresh cup of coffee right about now.
But we all need something, I reckon.
I'll cover you, soldier. I'll shine a spotlight to let you climb the shipping containers.
I’ll cover you, soldier. I’ll shine a spotlight to let you climb the shipping containers.
Now that I know you're not a government stooge, check out what I found outside.
It's the key to the shipyard's computer network!
Who knows how deep the rabbit hole goes...
